00009 #include "TTGain.h"
00010 
00011 
00012 TTGain::TTGain(TTUInt8 newMaxNumChannels)
00013         : TTAudioObject::TTAudioObject(newMaxNumChannels)
00014 {
00015         registerParameter(TT("linearGain"),     kTypeFloat32,   &gain);
00016         registerParameter(TT("gain"),           kTypeInt32,             NULL,   (TTGetterMethod)&TTGain::getGain, (TTSetterMethod)&TTGain::setGain);
00017 
00018         // Set Defaults...
00019         setParameterValue(TT("linearGain"),     1.0);
00020         setProcess((TTProcessMethod)&TTGain::processAudio);
00021 }
00022 
00023 
00024 TTGain::~TTGain()
00025 {
00026         ;
00027 }
00028 
00029 
00030 TTErr TTGain::setGain(const TTValue& newValue)
00031 {
00032         gain = dbToLinear(newValue);
00033         return kTTErrNone;
00034 }
00035 
00036 
00037 TTErr TTGain::getGain(TTValue& value)
00038 {
00039         value = linearToDb(gain);;
00040         return kTTErrNone;
00041 }
00042 
00043 
00044 TTErr TTGain::processAudio(TTAudioSignal& in, TTAudioSignal& out)
00045 {
00046         short                   vs;
00047         TTSampleValue   *inSample,
00048                                         *outSample;
00049         short                   numchannels = TTAudioSignal::getMinChannelCount(in, out);
00050         short                   channel;
00051 
00052         for(channel=0; channel<numchannels; channel++){
00053                 inSample = in.sampleVectors[channel];
00054                 outSample = out.sampleVectors[channel];
00055                 vs = in.vs;
00056                 
00057                 while(vs--)
00058                         *outSample++ = (*inSample++) * gain;
00059         }
00060         return kTTErrNone;
00061 }
